duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee installations and configurations of Teamcenter to ensure seamless operation and optimal performance.
Drive configuration of Teamcenter, showcasing hands-on proficiency in the process.
Implement deployment strategies with a focus on high availability, clustering, and load balancing for both Teamcenter and Active Workspace.
Utilize automation scripts, particularly Ansible, to streamline processes and enhance efficiency.
Collaborate effectively with subject matter experts and stakeholders to gather and document requirements.
Craft comprehensive system design documentation that serves as a blueprint for successful PLM implementation.
